name: Salami Rosettes
author: Margherita Meats
summary: Creamy cheese and tangy capers combine with the robust flavor of Margherita® Genoa salami and a hint of fresh basil for a sensational starter.
ingredients: ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese or shredded Asiago cheese
24 slices thin deli-sliced Margherita® Deli Genoa Salami
24  yellow or red cherry or grape tomatoes, or a combination of yellow and red
directions: Combine cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, capers and basil, mixing well
Spread 1 teaspoon cheese mixture over center of each slice of salami
Place one tomato in center of cheese
Gather up salami around cheese and tomato, forming a rosette and pressing lightly to hold shape
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate for up to 24 hours before serving to guests
